text: The Palace and the Fortress () is a 1924 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky.ДВОРЕЦ И КРЕПОСТЬДворец и крепость (1923) It stars Yevgeni Boronikhin, Yuri Korvin-Krukovsky, and Marina Yuryeva. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1924 drama movies Category:1920s biographical movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky
title: The Palace and the Fortress
